article_title: Family: Lack of discharge plan likely a factor in man's death
article_text:
Easton, MD (21601)

Today

Sunny to partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 86F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
